name: spineless
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A spineless person does not have much determination and is not willing to take risks: He was, she concluded, a spineless individual. Synonyms
gutless informal
namby-pamby informal disapproving
wet (WEAK) UK
wishy-washy informal disapprovingOpposite
gutsy informal

lacking determination and the willingness to take risks: It upset me to realize how spineless I was.
